title: Disqualification by interest
context: [ยง612-5] Disqualification by interest. No person shall sit as a juror in any case in which the person&rsquo;s relative by affinity or by consanguinity within the third degree is interested, either as a plaintiff or defendant, or in the issue of which the juror has, either directly or through such relative, any pecuniary interest. [L 1973, c 191, pt of ยง1; gen ch 1985]
